Docs.summary: Checks the availability of the given service namespace across all Azure subscriptions. This is useful because the domain name is created based on the service namespace name. Request Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.NotificationHubs/checkNamespaceAvailability Operation Id: Namespaces_CheckAvailability
